sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { EMAIL_DOMAINS } from 'src/app/constants'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'], }) export class RegisterComponent { domains = EMAIL_DOMAINS; matchPasswords: string = ''; register(form: NgForm) { const { password, rePassword } = form.value; if (password !== rePassword) { this.matchPasswords = 'error'; return; } console.log(password, rePassword); } }

Email is required!

Email is not valid!

Username is required!

Username must be at least 5 characters!

Password is required!

Password must be at least 5 characters!

Repeat password is required!

Repeat Password does not match password!
